name: LUCAS - Basement Demo
description:
LUCAS - The Basement (Demo)

LUCAS is a first-person horror game highly inspired by RE7 but without any way of defending yourself like in Outlast. This short playable teaser is only focused on the Basement scene of the game and its only purpose is to showcase what the game might look like in the final product. So expect some bugs and errors while playing this short teaser.

NOTE: This is just a short playable teaser made by Keneth Agar of SolitaryStudios, Filipino horror developers, and made in just 2 weeks. This is just an early test and things might change in the final product soon.  Hope you enjoy playing!

DONATIONS: This game is so expensive to make. Our team is consisting of 4 college students and has limited funds so we appreciate any amount of donations. It will help us a lot! Thank you so much!
